CHN_PINYIN: ná mó léng yán huì shàng fó pú sà
ENG: Namo Surangama Assembly of Buddhas and Bodhisattvas

CHN_PINYIN: ná mó léng yán huì shàng fó pú sà
ENG: Namo Surangama Assembly of Buddhas and Bodhisattvas

CHN_PINYIN: ná mó léng yán huì shàng fó pú sà
ENG: Namo Surangama Assembly of Buddhas and Bodhisattvas

CHN_PINYIN: miào zhàn zŏng chí bù dòng zūn
ENG: O deep and wondrous dharani unmoving Honored One

CHN_PINYIN: shŏu léng yán wáng shì xī yŏu
ENG: Supreme Surangama appears most rarely in the world.

CHN_PINYIN: xiāo wŏ yì jié diān dăo xiăng
ENG: Extinguishing deluded thoughts from countless kalpas past

CHN_PINYIN: bù lì sēng qí huò fă shēn
ENG: I need not pass through aeons till the dharma body's gained.

CHN_PINYIN: yuàn jīn dé guŏ chéng băo wáng
ENG: I wish to now attain the way: and as the Dharma King.

CHN_PINYIN: huán dù rú shì héng shā zhòng
ENG: I will then return to rescue beings more than Ganges' sands.

CHN_PINYIN: jiāng cĭ shēn xīn fèng chén chà
ENG: This deep resolve I offer to the myriad Buddhas' lands,

CHN_PINYIN: shì zé míng wéi bào fó ēn
ENG: And thus endeavor to repay the Buddha's boundless grace.

CHN_PINYIN: fú qĭng shì zūn wéi zhèng míng
ENG: I humbly ask the Bhagavan to certify my quest:

CHN_PINYIN: wŭ zhuó è shì shì xiān rù
ENG: To enter first the evil world --- the five turbidities;

CHN_PINYIN: rú yī zhòng shēng wèi chéng fó
ENG: If yet a single being's not accomplished Buddhahood

CHN_PINYIN: zhōng bù yú cĭ qŭ ní huán
ENG: Accordingly I also must renounce nirvana's bliss.

CHN_PINYIN: dà xióng dà lì dà cí bēi
ENG: O great in courage, great in power, great compassionate one!

CHN_PINYIN: xī gèng shĕn chú wēi xì huò
ENG: I pray would now uncover and dispel my subtlest doubts.

CHN_PINYIN: lìng wŏ zăo dēng wú shàng jué
ENG: Thus cause me quickly to attain supreme enlightenment,

CHN_PINYIN: yú shí fāng jiè zuò dào chăng
ENG: And sit within the Bodhimandas of the tenfold realms

CHN_PINYIN: shùn ruò duō xìng kĕ xiāo wáng
ENG: And even could the nature of sunyata melt away

CHN_PINYIN: shuò jiā luó xīn wú dòng zhuăn
ENG: My vajra-like supreme resolve would still remain unmoved.

CHN_PINYIN: ná mó cháng zhù shí fāng fó
ENG: Namo Eternally Abiding Buddhas of the Ten Directions.

CHN_PINYIN: ná mó cháng zhù shí fāng fă
ENG: Namo Eternally Abiding Dharma of the Ten Directions.

CHN_PINYIN: ná mó cháng zhù shí fāng sēng
ENG: Namo Eternally Abiding Sangha of the Ten Directions.

CHN_PINYIN: ná mó shì jiā móu ní fó
ENG: Namo Sakyamuni Buddha.

CHN_PINYIN: ná mó fó dĭng shŏu léng yán
ENG: Namo Supreme Surangama of the Buddha's summit.

CHN_PINYIN: ná mó guān shì yīn pú sà
ENG: Namo Guan Shi Yin Bodhisattva.

CHN_PINYIN: ná mó jīn gāng zàng pú sà
ENG: Namo Vajra Treasury Bodhisattva.
At that time the World Honored One
From the flesh mound at the crown of His head
Released a hundred-jeweled light

content: 光中涌出 千叶宝莲
CHN_PINYIN: guāng zhōng yŏng chū qiān yè băo lián
ENG: And a thousand petalled rare lotus arose from the midst of the light.

content: 有化如来 坐宝华中
CHN_PINYIN: yŏu huà rú lái zuò băo huá zhōng
ENG: Seated within the precious flower was a transformation body of Thus Come One

content: 顶放十道 百宝光明
CHN_PINYIN: dĭng fàng shí dào băi băo guāng míng
ENG: Whose crown in turn emitted ten rays of the hundred-jeweled effulgence.

content: 一一光明 皆遍示现 十恒河沙
CHN_PINYIN: yī yī guāng míng jiē biàn shì xiàn shí héng hé shā
ENG: All the myriad lights shone round about everywhere revealing Secret Trace Vajra Spirits, many as the sands of the ten Ganges rivers.

content: 金刚密迹 擎山持杵 遍虚空界
CHN_PINYIN: jīn gāng mì jī qíng shān chí chŭ biàn xū kōng jiè
ENG: Each holding aloft a mountain and wielding a pestle,they pervaded the realm of empty space.

content: 大众仰观 畏爱兼报
CHN_PINYIN: dà zhòng yăng guān wèi ài jiān bào
ENG: The great assembly gazed upward at once filled with fear and admiration.

content: 求佛哀佑 一心听佛
CHN_PINYIN: qiú fó āi yòu yī xīn tīng fó
ENG: Seeking the Buddha's kind protection, they single-mindedly listened
As, streaming light at the Buddha's invisible crown

content: 放光如来 宣说神咒
CHN_PINYIN: fàng guāng rú lái xuān shuō shén zhòu
ENG: The transformation Thus Come One proclaimed the spiritual mantra:
